messages.message: Last time Eugene and I met -- we both were discussing management/org structure pains and we decided that we'll write whatever we learn (that's why you see a lot of writing on our end: _"The Guiding Principles"_, _"The Company Weekly"_, _"Individual Weekly"_, _"The Strategy, The Structure, and The Staff_", and various _"Individual 1:1"_ docs). Eugene wrote this paper (for managing grad research). It's def interesting.
Eugene would be visiting SF in Jan, I think we should do a guest lecture when he is in SF? @Ted you want to host him? I might not be there at that time.

Of course, his org [grad research] operates at a very different scale and in a very different setting [vs. a company where the incentives and the motivations are very different] but I think it would still be worth to listen to his pains. :slightly_smiling_face:
Or, we can totally do a technical talk -- up to us?
